Description: Necklace of silver hung with various amuletic charms including a bird, fish, sword and amulet case; (sewn onto a velvet-covered card).
Acquisition notes: Af1992,14.1 to 10 were purchased from the Society of Friends (Quakers), 173 Euston Road, NW1, and is recorded as "a small collection of women's jewellery and accoutrements from southern Egypt".
